name: The Green Thumb
description:
Keybindings:

Q, W, E, R, and Space control the pinky, ring, middle, pointer, and thumb digits respectively.

Left Arrow progresses through the map until you enter combat.

Up, Down, and Right arrows will attempt a dodge in that direction. Perform the correct dodge to avoid damage.

The Green Thumb is a submission for Mini Jam 36 (Nature). 

You play as "The Green Thumb". Your goal is to take out as many pesky lumberjacks as possible before you die.

You control each finger of "The Green Thumb's" hand, and each finger has their own attack. You can also attempt to dodge lumberjack attacks by dodging in the correct direction.
